text: The Peugeot 207 is a car produced by Peugeot from 2006 to 2014. It is available with 4-cylinder petrol and diesel engines. It is based on the same platform as the CitroÃ«n C3. It was sold as a 3 or 5-door hatchback with a hard-top convertible and estate versions added in 2007, facelifted in 2009 and was replaced in 2012 by the 208, the estate was replaced by the 2008 crossover in 2013 but the convertible was not replaced. == Engines == * 1.4 54 kW (73 hp) * 1.4 16V 65 kW (88 hp) * 1.4 VTi 70 kW (95 hp) * 1.6 16V 80 kW (109 hp) * 1.6 VTi 88 kW (120 hp) * 1.6 THP 110 kW (150 hp) * 1.6 RC 128 kW (174 hp) * 1.4 HDi 50 kW (68 hp) * 1.6 HDi 66 kW (90 hp) and 80 kW (109 hp) 207 Category:Front wheel drive vehicles Category:2000s automobiles Category:2010s automobiles 207
title: Peugeot 207
